every_nth <- function(x, nth, empty = TRUE, inverse = FALSE) {
  if (!inverse) {
    if(empty) {
      x[1:nth == 1] <- ""
      x
    } else {
      x[1:nth != 1]
    }
  } else {
    if(empty) {
      x[1:nth != 1] <- ""
      x
    } else {
      x[1:nth == 1]
    }
  }
}
